duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the functionality, stability, and security of the end user computing environment, including hardware, operating systems, and application software.
Manage IT Asset Lifecycle Management, Application Distribution, and Patch Management.
Work with hardware and software vendors to verify timely product delivery and readiness for operation.
Maintain and nurture current SCCM deployment globally and progress Microsoft MEM deployment.
Contribute to desktop projects as a project team member and serve as tier 2 end-user services support.
Provide regular status communication updates to customers and stakeholders and manage incoming request tickets and incident tickets to established SLAs and project timelines.
Evaluate and recommend new tools/products to enhance the user experience and contribute to enhancing the organization's diverse and inclusive culture.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required; advanced degree preferred
